title: Everything you needed to work and stay in Southern Italy
goal: Our goal is to revitalize the villages of Southern Italy.
enhance: We want to enhance the forgotten Italian municipalities, thanks to the passionate participation of our community.
buttonText: Want to be part of the change?
description1: A project born to address the problem of depopulation of villages,
description3: It is aimed at all those who believe in this change:
description4: entrepreneurs, creators, marketers, developers, and remote workers.
description5: Inside you can find information, news, and a community that thinks like you.
followUs: Follow us and join the community
or_sign_in_with_email: Or sign in with Email and Password
orSignUpWithEmail: Or sign up with Email and Password
adminOrStructure: Are you an administration or do you have a structure?
admin_or_structure: Are you an administration or have a structure?
borghi_initiative: Borghi: an initiative born from popular will for the rebirth of our villages.
promote_revitalization: It was born to promote the revitalization of small realities.
dedicated_to_change: Dedicated to all those who believe in change:
entrepreneurs_creators: entrepreneurs, creators, marketing professionals, developers, and remote workers.
authentic_lifestyle: For those who want to embrace the authentic lifestyle of the villages and escape the chaos of the metropolises.
remember_roots: Dedicated to those who do not want to forget their roots.
slow_and_authentic: For those who seek a slower and more authentic life.
find_villages: Within our platform, you will find the most fascinating villages where you can work remotely
shared_vision: and, above all, you will find people who share your same vision.
click_to_learn_more: click below to learn more and join us.
thank_you_for_support: First of all, we want to thank you for your support
improve_southern_italy: Because if you have come this far it means you really want to improve Southern Italy.
borgo_criteria: Remember that all the listed villages have been chosen based on these objective criteria:
public_services: the presence of public services (hospitals, schools, etc.);
accessibility: the ease of reaching the village by public transport;
coworking_space: the presence of a coworking space nearby;
add_borgo: So if you think a village is missing, add one using the form below
internet_speed_info: Average quality of local Wi-Fi connection, take a look
house_price_info: Want to move and buy a house here? Check the prices above
airbnb_price_info: Currently we do not have a structure to host all members, but above is an indicative price for a group of 4 people (the number is purely arbitrary)
need_more: Need more? Press one of the buttons below to get more information on local services
feedback_request_thanks: send us feedback, a request, or simply a thank you.
name: Name
quote: Pe' fa' 'e cose bone ce vo' tiemp'
translated: Translated: to do good things takes time
pageNotAvailable: This page is not yet available, but
requirementsMet: If the village meets the minimum requirements,
addedSoon: we will add it as soon as possible.
